attributes.action: Jeremy Corbyn to lead UK-EU Environmental Policy negotiations post Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: The environment in which we live, is also one we share. Not just with our friends and family, but across borders and continents.
attributes.background:
In the coming months and years the UK will have to agree terms with the EU regarding Environmental Policy.

Jeremy has a strong, informed understanding of just how important our environment is, and I cannot think of anyone I would rather have negotiate how we manage future laws on the subject.
